content:
Hello.

I have a question about hData - hData Record Format (HRF) and the hData RESTful Transport (HRT)

'The hData specifications have been approved by Health Level 7 international (HL7) and the Object Management Group (OMG), and are being adopted by Continua Health Alliance for mobile health devices.

URL: http://www.projecthdata.org/standards.html

What is this normative version HL7 hData? Does this pattern have any relation to FHIR or was it only used to move with Fresh Look?

Should we heed this specification? I was a bit confused because it looks a lot like the FHIR.

If any more experienced colleague can help .....

Thank you.
FHIR is philosophically consistent with hdata/hrf. And once we were quite consistent with it. But oer time, it has become irrelevant and the details have changed, so we no longer claim consistency
